remarks: Value of the scalar sigma map at one.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hgmapval1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapval1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapval1.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapval1.i $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
hgmapval1.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapval1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapval1 $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` .1. ) = .1. ) $.
